verses.verse: <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>traveled<s%> with all that he <S%H935>had,<s%> and came to <S%H884>Beersheba,<s%> and <S%H2076>offered<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> to the <S%H430>God<s%> of his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H4759>visions<s%> of the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3290>"Jacob,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob!<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Here I am."

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am <S%H410>God,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>father.<s%> <S%H3372>Don't<s%> be afraid to go <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> for there I will <S%H7760>make<s%> of you a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%>

I will go <S%H3381>down<s%> with you into <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> I will also <S%H5927>surely<s%> bring you <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3130>again.<s%> Joseph <S%H7896>will<s%> <S%H3027>close<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>"

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> from <S%H884>Beersheba,<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5375>carried<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> their <S%H1>father,<s%> their little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> and their <S%H802>wives,<s%> in the <S%H5699>wagons<s%> which <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> to carry <S%H5375>him.<s%>

They <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H4735>livestock,<s%> and their <S%H7399>goods,<s%> which they had <S%H7408>gotten<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>â€” <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and all his seed with <S%H2233>him,<s%>

his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H1121>sons<s%> with <S%H1323>him,<s%> his daughters, and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and <S%H935>he<s%> brought all his <S%H2233>seed<s%> with him into <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

These are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons:<s%> <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H1060>firstborn.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben:<s%> <S%H2585>Hanoch,<s%> <S%H6396>Pallu,<s%> <S%H2696>Hezron,<s%> and <S%H3756>Carmi.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon:<s%> <S%H3223>Jemuel,<s%> <S%H3226>Jamin,<s%> <S%H161>Ohad,<s%> <S%H3199>Jachin,<s%> <S%H6714>Zohar,<s%> and <S%H7586>Shaul<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a Canaanite <S%H3669>woman.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi:<s%> <S%H1648>Gershon,<s%> <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> and <S%H4847>Merari.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> <S%H6147>Er,<s%> <S%H209>Onan,<s%> <S%H7956>Shelah,<s%> <S%H6557>Perez,<s%> and <S%H2226>Zerah;<s%> but <S%H6147>Er<s%> and <S%H209>Onan<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez<s%> were <S%H2696>Hezron<s%> and <S%H2538>Hamul.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar:<s%> <S%H8439>Tola,<s%> <S%H6312>Puvah,<s%> <S%H3102>Iob,<s%> and <S%H8110>Shimron.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun:<s%> <S%H5624>Sered,<s%> <S%H356>Elon,<s%> and <S%H3177>Jahleel.<s%>

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> whom she <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> in Paddan <S%H6307>Aram,<s%> with his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H1783>Dinah.<s%> All the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H7969>three.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad:<s%> <S%H6837>Ziphion,<s%> <S%H2291>Haggi,<s%> <S%H7764>Shuni,<s%> <S%H675>Ezbon,<s%> <S%H6179>Eri,<s%> <S%H722>Arodi,<s%> and <S%H692>Areli.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher:<s%> <S%H3232>Imnah,<s%> <S%H3438>Ishvah,<s%> <S%H3440>Ishvi,<s%> <S%H1283>Beriah,<s%> and <S%H8294>Serah<s%> their <S%H269>sister.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1283>Beriah:<s%> <S%H2268>Heber<s%> and <S%H4439>Malchiel.<s%>

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2153>Zilpah,<s%> whom <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and these she <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> even <S%H6240>sixteen<s%> <S%H5315>souls.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H802>wife:<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

To <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> whom <S%H621>Asenath,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6319>Potiphera,<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H204>On,<s%> bore to <S%H3205>him.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin:<s%> <S%H1106>Bela,<s%> <S%H1071>Becher,<s%> <S%H788>Ashbel,<s%> <S%H1617>Gera,<s%> <S%H5283>Naaman,<s%> <S%H278>Ehi,<s%> <S%H7220>Rosh,<s%> <S%H4649>Muppim,<s%> <S%H2650>Huppim,<s%> and <S%H714>Ard.<s%>
These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> who were <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob:<s%> all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> were <S%H702>fourteen.<s%>
The <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan:<s%> <S%H2366>Hushim.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali:<s%> <S%H3183>Jahzeel,<s%> <S%H1476>Guni,<s%> <S%H3337>Jezer,<s%> and <S%H8006>Shillem.<s%>

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1090>Bilhah,<s%> whom <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and these she <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob:<s%> all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> were <S%H7651>seven.<s%>

All the <S%H5315>souls<s%> who <S%H935>came<s%> with <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> who were his <S%H3318>direct<s%> <S%H3409>descendants,<s%> besides <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H802>wives,<s%> all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> were <S%H8346>sixty<s%> - <S%H8337>six.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> who were <S%H3205>born<s%> to him in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5315>souls.<s%> All the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> who <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> were <S%H7657>seventy.<s%>

He <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> to <S%H3384>show<s%> the <S%H6440>way<s%> before him to <S%H1657>Goshen,<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen.<s%>

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H631>prepared<s%> his <S%H4818>chariot,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> in <S%H1657>Goshen.<s%> He <S%H7200>presented<s%> himself to <S%H5307>him,<s%> and fell on his <S%H6677>neck,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> on his <S%H6677>neck<s%> a good <S%H5750>while.<s%>

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H6471>"Now<s%> let me <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H310>since<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> your <S%H6440>face,<s%> that you are <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H2416>alive.<s%>"

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and to his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> "I will go <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H559>speak<s%> with <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and will <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H251>him,<s%> 'My brothers, and my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> who were in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> have come to <S%H935>me.<s%>

These <S%H582>men<s%> are <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> for they have been keepers of <S%H4735>livestock,<s%> and they have <S%H935>brought<s%> their <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and their <S%H1241>herds,<s%> and all that they have.'
It will <S%H6547>happen,<s%> when Pharaoh <S%H7121>summons<s%> <S%H559>you,<s%> and will say, <S%H4639><s%> 'What is your occupation?'

that you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H5650><s%> 'Your servants have been <S%H582>keepers<s%> of <S%H4735>livestock<s%> from our <S%H5271>youth<s%> even until <S%H1>now,<s%> both we, and our fathers:' that you may <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen;<s%> for every <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>"
